mapper.insert: insert into YP values (#{YP_ID}, #{YP_NAME}, #{YP_PI}, #{YP_INFO}, #{YP_CATEGORY}, #{YP_SSIZE}, #{YP_CONTENT}, #{YP_RQMAGE}, #{YP_RQMJOB}, #{YP_RQMEDU}, #{YP_RQMMAJR}, #{YP_RQMFIELD}, #{YP_AI}, #{YP_PERIOD}, #{YP_PROCEDURE}, #{YP_ANM}, #{YP_URL}, NULL, NULL)
mapper.select: select * from ( select row_number() over(order by y.YP_ID) as yp_no, y.YP_CATEGORY, y.YP_NAME, y.YP_PI from YP y) YP2 where YP2.yp_no limit #{startRow}, #{amount}
select YP_CATEGORY, YP_NAME, YP_PI from YP
select YP_CATEGORY, YP_NAME, YP_PI from YP where YP_CATEGORY = #{YP_CATEGORY}
